'''Dark Wood Arch Wall''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Dark Wood Arch Wall is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fir Wood = 4
|White Iron Chunk = 4
|Red Dye = 4
|sort = Fir Wood,White Iron Chunk,Red Dye
}}
